snippet: Mr. Letts’s new play, “Mary Page Marlowe,” and a new adaptation of John Steinbeck’s “East of Eden” are among the highlights of the Chicago company’s 2015-16 season.
abstract: Mr. Letts’s new play, “Mary Page Marlowe,” and a new adaptation of John Steinbeck’s “East of Eden” are among the highlights of the Chicago company’s 2015-16 season.

headline.main: New Tracy Letts Play Coming to Steppenwolf Theater Next Year
headline.print_headline: New Tracy Letts Play To Steppenwolf Theater
